name: BadAss (itch) (HighCalibreWizard)
description:
BadAss is a rogue-lite, with old school vibes, inspired by the free board game with the same name. Level up, unlock build defining relics, and try to reach the final boss in the demon infested space station! Beware that the game can be punishing, if the winds of destiny stand against you!

The board game can be downloaded for free from https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/358222/BadAss

Also be sure to check out the sequel Telum, over at  https://highcalibrewizard.itch.io/telum
